At 18th level, youâ€™ve developed your ability to create explosives into a true art form. You gain the following benefits.

  • Your custom munitions can replicate the effects of the following grenades or mines: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.nhsKcN7HeW9YoaKx]{Concussion}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.IYVqcitNmFJyDnd0]{EMP}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.EiW0ine10omfSIqD]{Incendiary}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.qmQYvLU6hw2yk8q5]{Stun}.
  • You can now add two custom augments to any of your custom munitions.
  • You can use an action to respec one of the custom munitions you have already created, quickly changing its type and any augments you have applied to it. Once you have used this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can do so again.
